name: 5 more minutes (JacksonWebb, dylanwebb, taithethai, xTye)
description:
As you fall asleep you must fight off Horu who is adamantly trying to wake you up! As the sand flows through the hourglass the morning quickly approaches. 

The hero fires their magical bolt every 3 seconds. Adjust the crank to control the firing angle. Use the d-pad to move in all 4 directions.

Avoid Horu's dangerous attacks and fire 2 successful shots to flip the hourglass and extend the timer.

How long can you fend off Horu and sleep in?

Made for PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams August 2022 

Art and Design by Jackson Webb

Programming and Design by Dylan Webb

Music, Sound Effects and Integration by Tai the Thai

Additional Programming by Robert "Tye" Riley

Dedicated to Remy, sleep well
